li.label: no Mincho
li.description: There's no Mincho in here. But it's not problem, if it's not there, I just make it.

li.label: serve to Mincho
li.description: Your Freshness, I swear to rule you as a master and serve you as a servant at the same time.

li.label: supreme happiness
li.description: I'm so happy that there are so many Mincho.

li.label: rule and serve
li.description: It's good to rule the Minchos, but it's also very happy to be ruled by them.

li.label: oblivion of hatred
li.description: I don't care the days when I was experimented by the Empire any more. I just want to live here with the Minchos forever.

li.label: opinions on the Minchowitch
li.description: I'm so glad she does many things for us, but sometimes... I think she is going too far. Such as transforms other race into my kind. I'm happy to have more of my kind, but play with other race make me more happy and... excited.
